 error trace doesn't contain the bad exception. You only get:

ava.lang.AssertionError: Unexpected exception, 
> > > expected<java.util.No=
SuchElementException> but

code.

Actually, with timeouts th=
ere's another issue that came up from a
student today. The j.u.concurrent.T=
imeoutException doesn't have a
message that makes any sense. When that exce=
ption gets thrown it would
be nice to say "test execution timed out" or som=
ething.
